synopsis.text: The animated music video "The Circle of Butterflies" brings together the musical talents of Morfonica and Junichi Satou of fh√°na. Directed by Mitsuru Tsukiumi, this vibrant video features Morfonica performing an upbeat pop song composed and arranged by Satou. As the band plays joyfully amidst fluttering butterflies, Satou's catchy melody and thoughtful lyrics celebrate the magic of music and friendship. Whether you're already a fan of the BanG Dream! franchise or discovering Morfonica's sound for the first time, "The Circle of Butterflies" promises to be a treat for the ears and eyes.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
